title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it is not having any effect.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not take effect.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it should not be visible in the output PDF document.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'Properties' view.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Generate or view the PDF document to observe if the labeled item is still visible.
